name: everscale-sew
description: Cryptographic game SEW (Slashing, EVER, Whitepaper) - in fact it is rock, scissors, paper (ro-sham-bo), the game process is controlled via NFT
author: EverscaleGuild

scripts.setup: npm run setup-se && npm run setup-sol
scripts.build-web: yarn build-deps && parcel build --public-url ${URL:-/} --no-source-maps --out-dir dist --out-file index.html src/App.html
scripts.build-abi: yarn contract-wrap && node -e 'console.log(`export default ${JSON.stringify(require("./build/Game.abi").abi)} as const`)' > build/Game.abi.ts
scripts.build-deps: yarn build-asset && yarn build-abi && yarn build-nekoton
scripts.contract-wrap: yarn contract-compile && everdev js wrap --export commonjs-default --output Game.abi.js build/Game
scripts.contract-deploy-local: yarn se-local-reset && locklift run --config locklift.config.js --network localnet --script scripts/deploy.js && yarn contract-addr-cat
scripts.build-prod: yarn clear && yarn contract-addr-cat && yarn build
scripts.test-contracts: yarn se-local-reset && locklift test --config locklift.config.js --network local
